description.displayText: I interviewed a couple of people on care.com and didn't feel 100% comfortable with them. I was paranoid since I was a stay at home mom for almost 2 years. Then I met Julissa. I had interviewed her and had her come for about 2 hours to babysit to see how she and the kids took together. Because my kids were used to me being home and would usually cry for anyone else. Well it actually went better than I thought, Julissa came over with arts and crafts and kept the kids intrigued the whole time. So we hired her for the summer and she is amazing. We all loved her the same. I never worried about if my kids are being taken care of or if they were having fun. With Julissa I was able to go back to work without the extra stress of worrying . I honestly would still have her with us if she was available for more than the summer. Believe me the only reason she isn't still with me is because of her only being available full time during the summer. You won't be disappointed going with Julissa!

description.displayText: I hired Julissa to take care my 1 year old ,so my husband  and I can have  a date night.  She was very  friendly , pleasant  and playful  with my son . She took a good  care of him. I would definitely hired her again.
description.originalText: I hired Julissa to take care my 1 year old ,so my husband  and I can have  a date night.  She was very  friendly , pleasant  and playful  with my son . She took a good  care of him. I would definitely hired her again.

description.displayText: She has a son which she will do anything for. She isn't lazy or unpleasant. Her experience with children other then her own puts her above the average young woman. My child's experience with her was phenomenal that he can't stop talking about all the fun things they did. It's summer and staying home wasn't an option . She is not only fun but she also makes every experience a learning one for the little ones. Always comes prepared with new and fun ideas to do. She is a great person, mother and teacher to the youngest of babies to little pre teens . I would definitely recommend her to anyone who needs a trust worthy and respectful young lady to watch over there little ones !

description.displayText: Julissa is flexible & accommodating. She's very patient & the kids love her.
description.originalText: Julissa is flexible & accommodating. She's very patient & the kids love her.

description.displayText: she was very good with my two kids 7 and 2 they both adore her my 7 year old now 8.....stills asks for her. she played all sorts of fun games with them. She was available WHENEVER  I needed her even last minute. I would definitely hire her 10x again.
